comments: select distinct p id             from res partner p inner join membership membership line             on  p id   partner             where website published and company and id in             coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

from odoo import models

class MembershipLine(models.Model):

    _inherit = 'membership.membership_line'

    def get_published_companies(self, limit=None):
        if not self.ids:
            return []
        limit_clause = '' if limit is None else ' LIMIT %d' % limit
        self.env.cr.execute("""
            SELECT DISTINCT p.id
            FROM res_partner p INNER JOIN membership_membership_line m
            ON  p.id = m.partner
            WHERE website_published AND is_company AND m.id IN %s """ + limit_clause, (tuple(self.ids),))
        return [partner_id[0] for partner_id in self.env.cr.fetchall()]
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
